name: tinybuild
description: Versatile esbuild + node + python quart wrapper for a lightweight and frustration-free development experience.

scripts.dev: npm run pip && npm i --save-dev concurrently && npm i --save-dev nodemon && npm run concurrent
scripts.pip: pip install quart && pip install websockets
scripts.pwa: npm i workbox-cli && workbox generateSW tinybuild/node_server/pwa/workbox-config.js && npm run build && npm start

author: Joshua Brewster
